parlimenthuwata adala aayathana, kabinat samajikayan menma rajya sewakayan, adhikaranayata adala aayathana, saukhya ha adhyapana aayathana da shri lankawe allasa ha dushanaya sambandhawa prakata wi athi bawada mema matha wimasumedi helidaraw wi thibe.
namuth ee aya sewaka arthasadhaka aramudale mudal mankolla kanna dannawa.

nilar shri jayawardhanapura wishwawidyalaye sinhala gaurawa upadhidharayaku wana athara sinhala ha demala sahithya ya karana sahithya ha shasthriya kruthi gananawaka kathuwaraya da we.sahithya mehewara wenuwen bunka antharjathika sammanaya, rajya sammana, signis sammana athulu wiwidha agayimwalata lakwa athi hethema shri lanka rupawahini sansthawe widhayaka niladhariyeku da wana athara rajya sangitha anumandalaye samajikayaku washayen da katayuthu karayi.sinhala sanskruthi aayathanaye natya anumandalaya mewara loka natya dinaya (marthu 27) prawina natyawedi sayiman nawagaththegama wenuwen wenkara ohuge natya sahithya kala nirmana pilibanda agayamin sammanthranayak pawathweyi.”sayiman nawagaththegama pranama ulela” lesa meya idiripath wana athara sayiman nawagaththegama samaru deshanaya mahacharya mayikal pranandu wisin pawathwanu labana athara in anathuruwa pawathwena sakachcha warayata ranjith dharmakirthi, parakrama nirialla, ke.bi.herath, shriyantha mendis, jayalal rohana yana natyakaruwan adahas dakwimata niyamithaya.meya mema 27 wani dina pa.wa. 4.00ta kolambaa sinhala sanskruthi aayathanaye sudarshi shalawe pawathweyi.amara nanayakkara ge ’siyatal ge sithuwili se’ nam wu chithra pradarshanaya ada (24) kolambaa mahajana pusthakala pradarshana shalawedi pawathweyi.
wiharasthana dewala menma rajaye godanagilida me athara weyi.
emagin samastha samajayatama bhayanaka prathipala athwindimata siduwanu atha.
ee witharak neweyi bija gowipalawal wikka.
ada therawadihu eya ketharam aashawen pilipadiddayi apa kiya yuthu nowe.
me wage aththama katha gananawak sudu jathinge palana samayedi aththatama wela thiyanawa.
snanaya sandaha aushadhiya gunayen nanu sakasa ganima wiharayen sidu kareyi.
shikwal nohoth shukwal ho shringi yanuwen handinwena rajasthanaye brahminwaru yashngagen pawatha ennoya.

sathi kihipayakin masa kihipayakin wenadekuth nemeyi.
sama thathparayaka dima ekadigata labagath chayarupa rashiyak ekata amuna wisipas warayak wegawath wa mema widiyowa sakas kara thibe.
mata sahayogaya denawa.
thanaka ha wiya.
1 numbae aahara jalaya mathupita thabanna.
wisheshayenma 1962 warshaye lankawe nawakatha kalawa yomu wi thibune premaya mulkaragath sarala katha wethaya.
merata prakata wyaparika, prawahana amathyanshaye wathman lekam dhammika perera merata suprasiddha samagam samuhayaka niyojya sabhapathi lesa pathkara thibe.
adala nalikawa uthure sita kriyathmaka kirimata salasumkara athi athara, eya uthura dakuna yakarana nalikawak lesa pawathwagena yamata niyamithaya.
eeta passe sanwadayakuth thibba eeka gana.
lingikathwaya saha prajananaya gana lankawe lamayi mulinma igena ganne namaya wasara saukhya padamenya.
hariyata ma kiwwoth eya ‘samajawabodhayata pathwime’ mawathak.

menna magen obata prashna. - 9 + (89-71) gana api katha karana thuru uthuru nagenahira dawantha militari prasans ekak thibima sadharana wenawa neda? - 9 + (89-71) gana ahamin dakune unta balaya bedanna kiwwama un bedayida balaya?

bauddhayan wishala pirisak pana piti pulussa,wasa wisa wala thamba kakul ath kada awi walin ana mara damanne upadinnatath perayi.bauddha mawukusawala upadinne pawu kala ayada?.gabsa walin 90%kma bauddha kalalayi.me gana katha karanneth katholika kadinal thumayi.bhikshun wahansela dan waladamin thrushnimbhuthawa sitinawa.ape ratata thiyana lokuma prashne gawa ghathanayalu.mita hoda kathawak sumanadasa samarasinha mahatha kiwa.kala yuththe gawa ghathanaya gana than than wala wilapa dipa nowe.gawayan sadaha thruna bhumi athi kirimaya .ewita dharmadwipaya gawayanta pawara dimata puluwana.anek athata minisun marima gana pathalaya mahajana mudal nasthiya horakama dushanaya gana kisima kathawak na.mama me gana game danpin karana kenekugen ahuwa eya kiwe ee monawa thibunath kamak na gawa ghathanaya epalu.me rate minisunge gawa manasikathwaya palakayan dannawa .kudu wikunana ayapawa gawa ghathanayata erehi wanne in kalu salli sudukarana lesin thama pawu soda ganimatayi.prabhakaran metharam aparadha karala issarahata awith kiwwanam mama minimaranawa habayi mata pennanna bari gawa ghathanayayi kiyala.ehema wunanam merate gawayo prabhakaranta janadhipathikamath denawa
habayi thawamath chuti maniketa ara unda man eyawa balanna aawayi kiyala naha.

shripada peraharata idiriyen sammadame giya 9 k rimand balawayaskara 3 k mapiyanta bhara deyi kotiyakumbaura - ramyapala shripadasthanaye uda maluwa kara wadamawana sadhathuka karanduwa, samandewa prathimawa saha dewa aabharana ragath maha peraharata idiriyen wahanayaka nangi dewa prathimawak thabagena mudal sammadame yedunu dolos denagen nawa denaku ada (28 wanida) dakwa rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kirimatada balawayaskara sakakaruwan thidena owunge gnyathinta bhara dimatada ruwanwalla wadabalana mahesthrath di. ji. jayathilaka mahatha eeye (27 da) yatiyanthota polisiyata niyoga kaleya.

ohu 1599 di karana lada sancharayakadi sadahan kara athi paridi, “duriyan rasawinda athi ayata anuwa eyata aththe lowa anekuth siyalu palathuru wala rasa paradawiya haki uthkrushta rasayaki ”.

galkissa, kollupitaya, bambalapitiya, thangalla, mathara saha migamuwa wani muhudu thirawala pawathwena bich patiwalata ena tharuna - tharuniyanta alewi kirima sandaha mema math pethi thogaya genawith thibena bawa da polis buddhi anshayata wadiduratath thorathuru wartha wi thibe.
udin nagena gini jalaya polawa dakwa gaman karanawa.
mama lama wiye sita ma, enam sirimawo bandaranayaka mathiniyage 1970-1977 rajaya kale sita shri lanka nidahas pakshayata almak dak wu pudgalayek.
pethi ganna parakku karanawa kiyanne pethi wala sakriya bhawaya adu wena eka.
mama hithana hatiyata paniwidaya kiwwe nam gam wasagam mathaka thiyan yana eka wentathi..

awurudu 25 kata pasu apa labu me nidahase thawath ek prathipalayak lesa wlpaththu wanarajadhaniye doratu maha janayata wiwrutha wimayi. 2010 pebarawari 27 wana dina parisarika amathya patali champika mathithuma wisin wiwrutha wu athara me suwisheshi awasthawata thanthirimale rajamaha wiharadhipathi, pujya thanthirimale chandrarathana himi athulu sangharathnaya saha pradeshaye prabhupirisa me awasthawata sahabhagi wuha.
ewaka siya jiwithaye wadath parinatha awadhiya gewamin siti mahagamasekara prabuddha kawyaya liyanne sahruda kalakaruwanta, rasikayanta ha anagatha jana samajayata paniwudayak lesini.

‘‘ka්risbro aayathanaya apata mema awasthawa laba dimen pasu mage bohomayak pa්rashna wisanduna wagema honda jiwithayak gatha kirime awasthawath mata uda wuna, mata samajayata denna thiyena paniwidaya thamayi mona pa්rashna aawath man wage shakthimathwa wada karanna.”yayi aya pawasayi.

eyata kalin maithripala eeniya podu apekshakaya wenna thiranaya kele ahalepola anugamanaya karamin. 1813-14-15 kalaye udarata nilamewarun bala thanhawa ha depola waraprasada labaganima sandaha ekinekata wiruddhawa kriya kala wage ma shri la ni pakshaye manthriwaruth 2014-15-16 kalaye katayuthu kala.
